name: Space Escapator
description: I created this game in Unity 3D, Making models in Blender. The music is made in Bosca Ceoil, And the soundeffects are made with sfrx. I learned how to program with lots of videos. And i started to program in 2019 but some times i quit but end up coming back again. I didnt touch unity for like a year and started this proyect is really simple and I made it in a couple days really quickly. Is not finished but it was so i can come back to programing.
